description: This file contains CRUD functions for managing Profile, HeightCategory, and WeightCategory models in a SQLAlchemy-based backend. It provides create, read, update, delete, and filtered listing functionalities for profile data and category data.

methods.name: models.Profile create_profile(db: Session, data: dict)
methods.description: Creates a new profile record in the database with provided data.

methods.name: Optional[models.Profile] get_profile(db: Session, profile_id: int)
methods.description: Fetches a profile by its primary key (profile_id).

methods.name: Optional[models.Profile] update_profile(db: Session, profile_id: int, updates: dict)
methods.description: Updates an existing profile with new data; returns the updated profile or None if not found.

methods.name: bool delete_profile(db: Session, profile_id: int)
methods.description: Deletes a profile by id; returns True if successful, False otherwise.

methods.name: List[models.Profile] list_profiles_filtered( db: Session, height_category_id: Optional[int] = None, weight_category_id: Optional[int] = None )
methods.description: Lists profiles filtered optionally by height and weight categories, applying range conditions based on category min/max values.

methods.name: List[models.HeightCategory] get_height_categories(db: Session)
methods.description: Retrieves all height categories ordered by minimum height.

methods.name: List[models.WeightCategory] get_weight_categories(db: Session)
methods.description: Retrieves all weight categories ordered by minimum weight.

ctags.name: list_profiles_filtered
ctags.signature: ( db: Session, height_category_id: Optional[int] = None, weight_category_id: Optional[int] = None )

ctags.name: update_profile
ctags.pattern: /^def update_profile(db: Session, profile_id: int, updates: dict) -> Optional[models.Profile]:$/
